attributes.action: To legislate for a referendum in Northern Ireland regarding abortion laws.
attributes.additional_details: Enough is enough- women everywhere are having to suffer because the lack of freedom regarding THEIR OWN BODIES! Something needs to change, for the WOMEN of Northern Ireland! Use your HUMAN RIGHT to give them THEIR HUMAN RIGHT!!
attributes.background: Calling on the UK Parliament to change the law, to take back the responsibility for the law on abortion and then to legislate for a referendum in Northern Ireland.

rejection.details:
People who create petitions are required to give their full, real name. Sorry if this wasn’t clear to you.

You might want to sign this petition that calls for the powers to set abortion law in Northern Ireland to be returned to the UK Parliament: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/261686
